Package net.sourceforge.jibs.command

Provides the implementations of all commands the server understands.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JibsCommand This is the central interface all commands must implement.
 

Class Summary
About_Command The About command.
Accept_Command The Accept command.
Address_Command The Adress command.
Away_Command The Away command.
Back_Command The Back command.
Board_Command The Board command.
Cls_Command  
Double_Command The Double command.
Exit_Command The Exit command.
Invite_Command The Invite command.
Join_Command The Join command.
Kibitz_Command The Kibitz command.
Leave_Command The Leave command.
Login_Command The Login_Command will be invoked by jIBS when a user tries to login.
Motd_Command The Motd command.
Move_Command The Move command.
NewUser_Command The NewUser_Command will be invoked by jIBS when a user tries to register a new account.
NImplemented_Command Some commands are mapped to this command, given a not-yet-implemented to the user.
Password_Command The Password command.
Ratings_Command The Ratings command.
Reject_Command The Reject command.
Resign_Command The Resign command.
Roll_Command The Roll command.
Set_Command The Set command.
Shout_Command The Shout command.
Shutdown_Command The Shutdown command.
Tell_Command The Tell command.
Test_Command  
Toggle_Command The Toggle command.
Unknown_Command Whenever jIBS couldn't identify the command, it uses this command, given an Unknown command to the user.
Unwatch_Command The Unwatch command.
Watch_Command The Watch command.
Wave_Command The Wave command.
Whisper_Command The Whisper command.
Who_Command The Who command.
Whois_Command The Whois command.
 

Package net.sourceforge.jibs.command Description

Provides the implementations of all commands the server understands.
